comments.comment: It feels good to help a small creator get past 111 million subs.
Pewds is retired and doesnt take youtube seriously but he still pumps out golden nuggets like these that are entertaining as hell
It's hard to get new subs when you have all of them.
I hate it when small, underrated creators can't pass that one milestone they've always wanted to achieve. Keep going, PewDiePie, one day you'll reach 112M
Hardstuck at 111 million subscribers is tough, happened to my friend once, hope Pewds manages to push through it.
Pewdiepie is a dad man. I can see it just in the way he folds his arms. Its a dad fold... a dad fold. Happy for this guy.
Glad big creators like CinamonToastKen are helping desperate youtubers like pewdiwpie. Hopefully, he can help pewdiepie get past 111 million subs.

Real advice here. Anything that is “low barrier to entry” can basically directly translate to “highly competitive.” You will find the easiest success in high barrier to entry endeavors. If you buy an apartment building, you will almost certainly make a ton of money, but that is an extremely high barrier to entry.
Comment section is now open space to self advertise your channel
It's funny how these two gave more useful insight and advice by just thinking out loud, and explaining to eachother, than all the videos they watched.
I swear PewDiePie is the first successfully retired YouTuber
It's great to see Pewds break a barrier and get out of a slump. Congrats on 110M, Exciting that you've moved past 111
The reason you are stuck is because you are #1 so we keep you there. 111
This bad youtube advice video just turned into pewds and ken giving good youtube advice
Putting Mr beast on the thumbnail and a controversial title is smart considering the current landscape of YouTube

Crazy haw fast time flies man. I remember laying in my bed on school nights watching him play amnesia on the “just one more” train and now I’m a grown man getting back into pewds. All I have to say is thanks for all the entertainment you’ve provided us throughout our lives. Bless your soul and I hope for many more years of fun and laughter.
being stuck at 111 million subs is hard, pewdiepie is so strong for pushing through
Yo they actually kiss at the end. Totally worth to give him the watch time.
Damn BroKen popping up on screen was a crazy throwback
Not stuck at 111M now! Pewds finally made it to 110M
Man, I still miss the BroKen podcast, it was my first ever podcast! Felix and Ken have so much good energy between each other, the videos always slap. Love you guys!
The actual king of Youtube.
PewDiePie will always be a legend

4:37 Ken has a great point about YT Shorts here. As a creator who is just barely starting, my shorts gain way more views way faster than a live stream or a regular video. The audience traction is entirely different cause the shorts aren't what brings in long term viewership
Just two dads having fun after influencing generations for years.
Hope pewds can push through this insanely tough challenge of being stuck at 111 million subscribers, It must be tough

There are 111 mill. 9yo on this planet at any point and they are automatically unsubbed when they turn 10, and 8yo are automatically subbed when turn 9. That's why it is 111 mill. - it's a world in balance. That's my theory.
Love this format. Love how far you and everyone has come. Love when Ken's on.. it's soul-full.. not less.

The two of you with your fun Dad energy is such a good vibe. I love your collabs. It shows that to stay relevant, your content has to grow with you. Other streamers try hard, the equivalent of lip fillers and Botox and they look a mess, you and Ken keeping it natural in Chad Dad mode.

I truly love the combination of Felix and Ken so much and I'm so happy about the fact that like yesterday i watched Ken's new video with him and now here I am on Felix' channel. I've been through so many of the videos of them but i still get so excited when i see this duo popped out something new, thanks Felix for introducing me to Ken's channel!
I really appreciate these conversations about YouTube, genuinely
Ok but did anyone stay till 25:26 . Wtf
i fr miss the broken podcast please bring it back

24:00 
Pewdiepie reacting to pewdiepie 
What a time to be alive
Felix to Youtube after MrBeast: You could not live with your failure. So where did it bring you? Back to me.
It feels like visiting my cool grandpa whenever I watch this channel now. You are like the best retired youtuber

MrBeast when avoiding controversies: 
Pewdiepie when avoiding controversies:
Felix is retired Youtuber, Im just a retired fan. Sometimes I watch, usually I dont, but when I do, I really enjoy these.
Pewnews would be great with all thats going on we need some pewdiepie slaps
shorts truly are a plague
My dude even has entertaining ad segments man. Will always be a legend.
Pewds camera looks like I'm looking through a closet or something.
MrBeast getting called out by his idol would probably send him into a whole new downward spiral
congrats pewdiepie! you're not stuck at 111 million subs, you are now at 110
Doesn't matter what anyone says, Pewdiepie will forever be the king of Youtube!

There are SO MANY channels that just prey off the ignorance of younger people, in order to get views… It’s like they don’t even care about the advice they’re giving, they just say whatever to create viral clips

SO CRINGE

13:20 is exactly how I feel about the editing. Its so soulless and googoo gaga subway surfer editing. Like bruh chill. We dont need a zoom in every sentence. Pewds is talking about the editing right there

Honestly PewDiePie is one of the best YouTubers, sure there were some controversial moments in there but really not that bad. He kept doing what he wanted and started doing what he likes over content farming and now is happy and nearly retired from the YouTube landscape. I'm happy to have this channel during my teenage years and still rewatch the walking dead series. Glad you are happy with life Felix
The most famous YouTuber of today vs the most famous Youtuber of all time
I continually watch PEWDIEPIE for videos like these.  It's like a sneak peak behind the scenes, and the authenticity pewds and Ken have is why they are as beloved as they are.
It's been a while since I've watched a PewDiePie video, and it's great to see them so calm and relaxed and enjoying themselves after all that time. I might just keep coming back for more.

he made it off 111 million subscribers!
Just gotta make it back.
6:13 Ken finding the smallest details in any video will always be amusing
All I gotta say is bring back Fridays with Pewdiepie
19:30 I used to see Ken's comments everywhere! It was like a little treat seeing him in my corner of the internet

hey pewd, when you started talking about advice on starting a channel from 0 again - that was extremely interesting and i agree completely. dude, you should make a whole video on that - philosopher pewd i love it. and as a person trying to start a channel and then seeing people just do the same (honestly corporate feeling) content, i couldn't agree more
17:21 MrBeast"Your first video is not going to get views" ... Dogpack404 would say otherwise
16:53 imagine the king of YouTube messaging you like “please  stop it ”

I miss the golden age of Youtube with Pewds at the Top and other creators without the ADD style editing...just awesome moments and fun times. Glad to grew up with that content style with the likes of Nigahiga. Now everyone is chasing watchtime.
Not stuck at 111m anymore. Now it’s 110m. This video worked! Good job guys
